channel.title: Game crashs
channel.description: Hi, this is my first post i hope i can do it well (also sorry for my english level, i'm not a native speaker, i from Venezuela). First i wanna say thank you for read this and for your awesome mod BlackMesa (i hope you win in the Mod DB, i already vote for your mode). Well, now, the game crash. I already read that you have to name de folder BMS and i have it. [url]https://twitter.yfrog.com/z/0czhp[/url] My computer specs: CPU: AMD processor Phenom II x4 965 3.4 Ghz (Black series) GPU: ATI Radeon 4300/4500 Series (4350) 1 GB GDDR2 RAM (support DirectX 10.1) MOBO: ECS Elitegroup Black series 780GM - HD sound and video/HybridCrossFire RAM: 3.0 GB DDR2 800 Mhz HDD : 320 GB Hitachi Monitor: Flat Screen (LCD) VGA Generic 17" (not widescreen - not HD Display) (Resolution): 1280*1024 Audio: Stereo Speakers generic and Headset Genius® OS: Microsoft Windows 7® (64- bit version) I used fraps and i have 25 fps with no full settings. [url]https://twitter.com/i/#!/Roberto_Fergus/media/slideshow?url=pic.twitter.com%2FRGmTUNNV[/url] SS of the crash message: [url]https://twitter.yfrog.com/0j38p[/url] And i attached the mdmp. I think is the first one for the date. Thank you. hl2_4104_crash_2012_12_17T5_24_2C0.mdmp (110 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_18T5_7_55C0.mdmp (87.9 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_4T21_45_20C0.mdmp (93.2 KB)

item.title: Game crashs
item.dc:creator: Avalokitesvara
item.description:
Hi, this is my first post i hope i can do it well (also sorry for my english level, i’m not a native speaker, i from Venezuela).

First i wanna say thank you for read this and for your awesome mod BlackMesa (i hope you win in the Mod DB, i already vote for your mode).

Well, now, the game crash.

I already read that you have to name de folder BMS and i have it.
https://twitter.yfrog.com/z/0czhp

My computer specs:
CPU: AMD processor Phenom II x4 965 3.4 Ghz (Black series)
GPU: ATI Radeon 4300/4500 Series (4350) 1 GB GDDR2 RAM (support DirectX 10.1)
MOBO: ECS Elitegroup Black series 780GM - HD sound and video/HybridCrossFire
RAM: 3.0 GB DDR2 800 Mhz
HDD : 320 GB Hitachi
Monitor: Flat Screen (LCD) VGA Generic 17" (not widescreen - not HD Display)
(Resolution): 1280*1024
Audio: Stereo Speakers generic and Headset Genius®
OS: Microsoft Windows 7® (64- bit version)

I used fraps and i have 25 fps with no full settings.

https://twitter.com/i/#!/Roberto_Fergus/media/slideshow?url=pic.twitter.com%2FRGmTUNNV

SS of the crash message:

https://twitter.yfrog.com/0j38p

And i attached the mdmp. I think is the first one for the date. Thank you.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_12_17T5_24_2C0.mdmp (110 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_18T5_7_55C0.mdmp (87.9 KB)
